name: Death Knight
description:
Death Knight is a top-down cave exploration shooter! 

Can you make it to the final floor??

For the majority of us this was our first ever game jam submission, and first ever working "finished" game! We are aware that there are still many bugs that exist in our game and we plan to update the game in the future for a better player experience. That said, we were excited to share in this journey and learned a ton from the experience. 

Thank you for playing!

Team:

  • EpicUwU - Art Assets & Design
  • SeanSmeedComposer - Sound Design & Music
  • YoungbladeStudios - Game Design & Programming
